item.title: Handy hints for using dtrace on the Mac
item.description: I’m a big fan of Linux tools which allow you to monitor things in great detail.

item.title: Tap into your Linux system with SystemTap
item.description: One of the most interesting topics I’ve seen so far during my RHCA training at Rackspace this week is SystemTap.
